contentitemdata.dancinggoat.coffee.CoffeeDescription:
This coffee comes from a family business in El Salvador and you can really feel that this coffee is made with a passion and tradition that that has lasted three centuries. The smooth, creamy mouth sensation is something you just must try. It doesn't matter if you prefer espresso or a sundae, El Salvador Finca San Jose is one of the El Salvador's finest.


Taste Finca and you will never forget its clean, sweet chocolate taste of cherries and oranges.
contentitemdata.dancinggoat.coffee.CoffeeShortDescription: A passionate traditional Salvadorian coffee with the creamy sensation of a sweet chocolate taste, suitable for all types of preparation.
